org.typemeta.funcj.util

Interface RNG


  • public interface RNG
    Pseudo-random number generator, using the State monad.

    Implementations of this interface provide pseudo-random number generation. Implementations must implement at least one of generateDouble0To1() or generateLong()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Tuple2<RNG,Double> generateDouble0To1()
      Return a pair containing the next RNG state and the next random double.
      default Tuple2<RNG,Long> generateLong()
      Return a pair containing the next RNG state and the next random long.
      static State<RNG,Double> nextDbl() 
      static State<RNG,Long> nextLng() 
      static RNG xorShiftRNG(long seed)
      Return a RNG based on the XorShift algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • xorShiftRNG

        static RNG xorShiftRNG(long seed)
        Return a RNG based on the XorShift algorithm.
        Parameters:
        seed - the initial seed for the RNG
        Returns:
        the RNG
        See Also:
        https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Xorshift

      • nextDbl

        static State<RNG,Double> nextDbl()
        Returns:
        a state processor which will generate the next random double

      • nextLng

        static State<RNG,Long> nextLng()
        Returns:
        a state processor which will generate the next random long

      • generateDouble0To1

        default Tuple2<RNG,Double> generateDouble0To1()
        Return a pair containing the next RNG state and the next random double.
        Returns:
        a pair containing a random double value in the range 0 to 1 inclusive

      • generateLong

        default Tuple2<RNG,Long> generateLong()
        Return a pair containing the next RNG state and the next random long.
        Returns:
        a pair containing a random long value
